name: Cute Snake Sandbox
description:
One day, I woke up thinking it would be cool to have the old snake game, but in 3D. That became a flying (or swimming?) snake, and stuff kept adding on the top of it. I might do something with this one day.

As the body needs to keep growing, it's made with a procedurally generated mesh and rig. Next step will be to attach the head of this poor animal.
